synopsis.text:
That fateful day, singing enthusiasts Mai and Saki embarked on a journey to participate in a prestigious singing contest, unaware of the extraordinary adventure that awaited them. En route, they crossed paths with an enigmatic stranger, who revealed himself to be a minion of the nefarious organization, Dark Fall. The stranger's objective was to locate the oldest timepiece in the city, which was no ordinary artifact; it served as a gateway to the enchanting World of Clocks.

Dark Fall's malevolent intentions involved halting the flow of time to plunge the world into chaos and assert dominance. Alas, the singing competition became the stage for his sinister plan, as time froze, leaving the attendees in a state of bewilderment.

Just when all hope seemed lost, benevolent clock spirits emerged, whisking Mai and Saki into the mesmerizing World of Clocks. United by a common goal, the duo and the spirits joined forces to navigate a complex maze and outwit their cunning adversary. As the legendary Pretty Cure, Mai and Saki faced the challenge of overcoming their differences to reignite the flow of time and safeguard their world from the clutches of Dark Fall. This thrilling tale unfolds following the events of episode 30 in Futari Wa Pretty Cure Splashâ˜†Star.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
